Genesis: Khyehyeike bonyo Hulasokwe yala laitke kyor lasmyerke.
Ti lasmyerke khaha neke lenla kika namit-namit ti, de knani a nggora, ode kelerakokke kkyahat eta tasi malosy-masir ne bo, ode Hulasokwe Memeanke knyem ti de knyem ma ti tasi desy.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe tyanuk ma byu de byohe, “Lemamo kika madelah.” Dendye madelahke kimin. Hulasokwe yatos madelah desyo dyakin, dendye isali madelahke toha kelerakokke.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe tyanuk ma byu de byohe, “Lemamo kika madelah.” Dendye madelahke kimin. Hulasokwe yatos madelah desyo dyakin, dendye isali madelahke toha kelerakokke.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe yaki madelah desike ti “msarinke” ode kelerakokke ti “metdyetke.” Dendye kika sewah o msarin, neke sew a mamunake desy.
Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe byu huruk de byohe, “Lemamo kusali a wer ne ma kika klelan.”
Lemade Hulasokwe isali wer desy ma mamin ti srake ode mamin ti hahke, desikeo ktela desike kdi ti.
Dendye Hulasokwe hyaly a klelan desike ti “laitke.” Lemade kika sewah o msarin, neke sew a enaruke desy.
Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe tyanuk huruk ma byu de byohe, “Lemamo wer mamin ti lasmyerke khaha neke kiwahuk i ti a wenke it, ma kika wen bakbak.” Desikeo ktela desike kdi ti.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe yaki wen bakbak desike ti kani a “rake,” klala wer mawahuk i desike yaki kanike ti a “tasike.” Hulasokwe yatos nam iala desikre mo eras.

Maktei o Hulasokwe byu huruk de byohe, “Lemamo ti lasmyerke khaha neke tnyei o nam nekre ktyuhw ti, ktyabal aw maka kisi o khatu salno salik nekre mumu, mamode kika aw o tnyei ti lasmyerke khaha ne.” Bonyo ktela desike kdi ti huruk.
Lasmyerke khaha neke kbyenw ti aw ksitu mur nekre, ktyabal nam ribun matuhw maka khatu nekre, desikeo Hulasokwe yatos ktela neke mo klyakut eras.
Dendye kika sewah o msarin, neke sew a enatelkwe desy.

Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe byu huruk de byohe, “Lemamo kika nam madelah ti laitke, ma kisali a msarinke kyor metdyetke. Ode nam madelah desikre kyeluk nyatos ma klyosu sew o hul o ain, ode nam madelah desikre kdyelah lasmyerke khahake mumu.” Dendye ktela desike kdi ti kola Hulasokwe itanuk desy.

Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe byu huruk de byohe, “Lemamo kika nam madelah ti laitke, ma kisali a msarinke kyor metdyetke. Ode nam madelah desikre kyeluk nyatos ma klyosu sew o hul o ain, ode nam madelah desikre kdyelah lasmyerke khahake mumu.” Dendye ktela desike kdi ti kola Hulasokwe itanuk desy.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe yala nam madelah lan neke enaru, neke lan lahukke sekwe ma kdyelah a msarinke, klala kakanke neke hulke ma kdyelah metdyetke, ode yala thunare dakun.
Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe tyutuk nam desikre mumu ti laitke ma kdyelah lasmyerke khaha ne mumu,
ma kdyelah msarinke o metdyetke ode kisali madelahke toha kelerakokke. Hulasokwe yatos mo eras mumu.
Lemade kika sewah o msarin, neke sew a enaatke desy.
Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe itun huruk ma byohe, “Lemamo ti a tasike krala ne heal o ail a rala rti de rala rma, ode manunare o rnem ti de rnem ma ti a sra lait ne.”
Mane Hulasokwe yala heal lan de lan nekre rtabal heal ribun salno salik mamorif ti a tasike krala ne, ode yala manu salno salik manem ti a sra lait ne. Hulasokwe yatos nam desikre mo eras.
Lemade Hulasokwe yal eraske ti nam ribun lan nekre mumu ma byohe, “Heal o ail e! Mbyes ma mbyenw tasike krala ne. Ode manu e, mbyes dakun ma mbyenw a lasmyerke khaha ne.”
Lemade sewah desike ksyakut ode msarinke kmya, bonyo sew a enasimke desy.
Dendye Hulasokwe tyanuk huruk de byohe, “Lemamo lasmyer neke khyetuk a heal salno salik mamorif nekre, neke heal malamy o heal mamaruh o mata mnas nekre.” Dendye ktela desike kdi ti.
Ode Hulasokwe iala heal a lan o kakan mamaruh o mata mnas nekre, ode heal malamy ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu maktei bonyo, Hulasokwe yatos nam ribun desikre o eras.
Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe tyanuk huruk de byohe, “Lemamo taka irire ma rola Ity.
Iry nekre ana rhareta heal o ail mamin tasike krala ne, rtabal manu manem ti sra lait ne, ode heal mamaruh o malamy o mata mnas mamin a ra nekre mumu.”
Lemade Hulasokwe ika irire ma rola I, neke ika iry a wamwankye ode iry a wamfwetke ma uno matat ne kola Hulasokwe.

Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe yal eraske ti a iry deru desy, ode byu ti sir de byohe, “Mika ebnwo anamy ma mmyel ma mbyenw ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode mhyareta ti nus ne mumu, ma msyeak a heal o ail mamin ti a tasike krala ne, rtabal manu manem ti a sra lait ne, ror heal mamin a lasmyerke khaha ne.”
Hulasokwe tyanuk huruk de byohe, “Mtyomolu, ana kal nam matuhw a maka khatu ti lasmyerke ktem ne ode aw ribun a maka kisi o khatu ma kyeluk a kotw ma mi o myenw.

Klala ti a heal mamea nekre mumu, neke heal mamin ti lasmyer ne, ktyabal manu mamin ti sra nekre, ana kal a sitw o tnyei o aw ktahi molmol ribun nekre ma kyeluk a kotw ti sir.” Ode nam desikre kdi ti mumu.
Maktei o Hulasokwe yatos nam iala nekre mumu eras a ksyalik. Lemade sewahke ksyakut ode msarinke kmya, bonyo sew a nemke desy.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe yala laitke ode lasmyerke khaha neke ktyabal kisi o nam nekre mumu maktei de.
Ode kyoat kinait sew a itkwe bonyo Hulasokwe lema kyarya. De imres ti sew a itw desy ti karya ikarya desikre.
Lemadendye Hulasokwe yal eraske ti sew a itw desy, ode ihatetak ma byohe, “Sew neke sew a asuskye ne.” Kali ti sew desike Hulasokwe imres ti wasi karya iala desikre mumu.
Lemadendye tkunw a Hulasokwe iala laitke ode lasmyer neke teike desy de.
Kyoat Hulasow YANWE
iala lasmyer ne ode laitke,
lenla kika sitw o tnyei o aw a matuhw ti lasmyerke khaha ne, kali Hulasow YANWE lenla nyauk uske ei lasmyerke khaha ne, ode lenla kika iry ma rseak ti a lasmyerke khaha ne dakun.
Keskyede yekwe kbyetik kyosy lasmyerke khaha ne ma ksyai ei srake, ma ktyubw lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.
Ode kyoat desikeo Hulasow YANWE yala irkye waltwanke toha rayahkwe. Maktei bonyo yohw memeanke ti iry desike nurake kralake, dendye iry desike myorif, ma wamwany a i.
Maktei bonyo Hulasow YANWE yala boke ti wen a Edenke, neke kimin ti a kseri timurke. Ode ti wen desike Hulasokwe tyutuk iry iala desike ti bo desy.

Lemadendye Hulasow YANWE yala kyakar aw nekre mumu toha lasmyerke khaha neke ma ktyuhw ti bo desy, ma tatos mo eras ode ta kisinare mo mtelas a ksyalik. Ode ti bo desike kditlanke dakun o Hulasokwe tyan akwe enaru. Neke akwe it ma kolnye iry mana aw desike kisike desikemo ana myorif nini nam, ode akwe it huruk ma kolnye iry mana aw desike kisike desikemo enmo hye eraske ode atyatke.
Ode ti bo desike dakun o sahke it ma knyaha kyosy Eden ma kyabetar a bo desy. Kyosy desy, sah desike kisan ma ksanake enaat.
Ksana mamunake kani a Pison, neke knyaha ma klyekw ti de klyekw ma ti lasmyerke khaha Hawila neke mumu, neke blyawanke kwenake desy.
Ode blyawan manosy hnu desike eras a ksyalik. Ti desy dakun o damar bedolake kyor a hatw a krisopraske.
Sahke ksana matoha mamunake kani a Gihon, neke knyaha ma klyekw ti de klyekw ma ti lasmyerke khaha Kushke ktemke mumu.
Sahke ksana matoha hurukke kani a Tigris, desyo sahke ksana neke knyaha ti kseri timur hnu Asyurke. Klala sahke ksana manosy lyakwe kani a Efrat.
Lemadendye Hulasow YANWE yal iry a iala desy ma tyutuk a i ti bo Eden desy kralake, ma ilaka ode syeak ti bo desy.
Dendye Hulasow YANWE tyunik haretke ti iry desy de byohe, “Aw ribun mamin ti boke krala neke kyosy o ma mu kisinare mumu bo,
keskyede munenenas aw maala irkye ma hye a atyat o eras desike murontyo mu kisike, kali kyoat sew muna akwe kisi desy bonyo ana mmwaty elik.”
Hulasow YANWE byu huruk de byohe, “Lema eras kolnye iry neke lol mesan a i bo. Lemamo ana kala irkye it ma deruke mais-mais a sir, ma iry kuala ne syaluk iry mamuna desy.”

Lemadendye Hulasow YANWE yal heal o nam ribun iala toha lasmyer neke, ma iwahuk sir a ktyabal manu manem ti sra lait ne mumu. Maktei bonyo yety heal o manu desikre mumu ti iry desike ma Hulasokwe yatos iry desike ma yaki heal o manu desikre anitare. Dendye iry desike yaki heal o nam mamorif desikre anitare mumu, ktyoha ihalkye, ma ana heal o nam desikre rhaly anitare kola dene iry desike ihaly ne dakun.
Iry desike yaki heal raorif desikre, manu mamin ti sra nekre, ode heal mamin ti skyamur a krala nekre, keskyede ti tenanke neke lema itot irkye it elik ma ana syaluk ti i.
Lemadendye Hulasow YANWE yala iry desy ma yenaf ma tyebti, maktei bonyo nyaik iry desike ruskwanke it, maktei bonyo kyahat eta kwena desy kyor kisike tebikan.
Ode irkye ruskwan dai Hulasow YANWE inal toha iry desike, yal ma ika irkye it, ma wamfwet a i. Lemadendye Hulasow YANWE yor wamfwet desy ba ti iry dai desy.
Ma iry desike byu de byohe, “I ne nde! I neke yosy lurikkwe, ode isike kyosy isikkwe, ma ana raki i ti ‘wamfwetke,’ kali ral i toha wamwankye.”
Kali koldyesike mane ana wamwankye tyutuk ena o ama ma ti yait sawa, ma deruke rawahuk sir ti nam sasamke.
Kyoat desikeo iry deru desike ramleh, keskyede iry desike yor sawa de it de lema myai it, kali lema rhe o ramleh.

Ni neke heal a maulak o matalik ti a heal mamin ti ra Hulasow YANWE iala nekre mumu. Lemade sew desike ni neke tyanuk ti wamfwet desy de byohe, “Aw mamin boke krala ne mumu neke bain-bain o Hulasokwe byu ma kete mi kisinare e?”
Lemade wamfwet desike hyalas ni desy de byohe, “Lema koldyesy, de aw kisi mamin ti boke krala ne Hulasokwe byu ma aramy mi mumu,

ode, ti boke kditlalan ne dakun o akwe enaru kimin ti. Ma akwe sasam neke Hulasokwe byu ma aramy mi kisinare, klala aw idake Hulasokwe byu ma kete aramy mi kisinare elik, ode kete aramy mkyumak o mikabir dakun, kali kolnye aramy myala ktela desy bonyo ana aramy myaty.”
Bonyo ni desike tyanuk ti wamfwet desy de byohe, “Lema koldyesy. Ana lema mmyaty.
Hulasokwe tyanuk koldyesy kalie hye ohe ana kolnye mi aw ne kisi desikre bonyo, huhumire kimlakat ode matamire khyela i bonyo mhye eraske o atyatke kola Hulasokwe ne dakun.”

Lemade wamfwet desike yatos a akwe kisi desike ma eras ode ra mo mtelas, lemade ryekan ti ralake de byohe, “Anakyai aw ne kisike kika kbuan, ma kolnye ku mo, ktwilik a khwe eras o atyat.” Dendye lyol simake ti byul akwe kisi desike ma nya, ode yal ti lai ma nya dakun.
Kyoat wamfwet wamwany a rana akwe kisi desike maktei bonyo, deruke matatare khyela i ma rhe o ramleh. Dendye rutur aw ktahinare
ma rlel eta smwelatare.
Sewah desike deruke rtomolu ma Hulasow YANWE lyakut ti boke krala desy, lemade deruke ramtaut kali ramleh, lemade rba ti rabuny ti a aw kusu desikre ma kete Hulasokwe myatakit a sir.
Keskyede Hulasow YANWE yabuk a wamwany desy de byohe, “Adam,
o ika?”
Lemade Adam a hyalas ma byohe, “O Hulasow O, ktwomolu ma mmwai bo ne kralake de, keskye kubuny kali kumtaut o kumleh.”
Lemade Hulasow YANWE yena i de byohe, “Esei ne ilosu ti o ohe mumleh ne de? De ande mu a akwe kisi kubu eta ti o ne e?”
Desike bonyo Adam a hyalas ma byohe, “De wamfwet munal i ma yaw ne i ne inal akwe kisi ne ma kuna ne nde.”
Lemade Hulasow YANWE tyanuk huruk ti wamfwet desy de byohe, “Kyanmwane muala ktela ne de?”
Bonyo wamfwet desike hyalas ma byohe, “De ni neke i ne iakal yaw mane kuna aw desike kisike ne nde.”
Dendye Hulasow YANWE itomolu tun desike bonyo, tyanuk ti ni desy de byohe,
“Kali mala koldyesy e, kala tnyetakke ti o toha heal mamaruh nekre, ode heal mamin lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.
Lemadendye kyala kyosy a senwe ma kiba knaru neke, mal a fteimkwe ma mlwamy ti lasmyerke, ode welno hahamw a ksyuruk i ti ahkwe bo.

Ode ana kiba knaru neke kala o ma mor a wamfwet desy it de imnisik a it, ma ti kyait wamfwet desike tesnwo natu, ror tesnwo natumw it de imnisik a it dakun. Ma wamfwet desy tesnwo natu syosno tyabak usumkwe khatuke, ode o a ana mkwuty a tikake.”
Maktei bonyo tyanuk ti a wamfwet desike ma byohe,
“Ana kolnye, mor tenamkwe ode kyait sew mudur hahke mo ana mkwoman a ksunsunuke a ksyalik, ode ana mobak ma mhwareta laimw keskyede ana mutomolu ike bo.”
Maktei bonyo tyanuk ti a wamwany desike ma byohe,

“Kali mbwu ma mtwomolu sawamw ma mu a akwe kisi kubu eta ti e desy, lemade kala lasmyer ne ma lema kika kisnyo klaran, khyali o. Ode kibai lulkwe ne munoha kotnwo abumw ti lasmyerke khaha ne mo ana ksunw ksyalik,
kali sitw o karkyary o tnyei mahaw nekre ana ktyuhw ti lasmyer ne dakun, ode kyosy lasmyer ne ana muknam toha.

Kolnye mkwarya ma mnwoha kotnwo abumw mo, ana mal nini maslyesare ksyu o ksyaw ti tenamkwe ktem ne nini mmwaty ma molik o bai lasmyerke, kali kala o toha lasmyerke, lemade ana mulak o bai lasmyerke huruk.”
Desike bonyo Adam a yaki sawa ma ani Hawa,
kali iry mamorif mamin nuske ktem ne enat a i.
Lemade Hulasow YANWE yal healare dum a iblut, ode ika iry desy yor sawa-na wait rabitare. Maktei o yal ma hyonak o ryabit sir ma kyeteta tenatare.
Hulasow YANWE ihonak iry desikre maktei bonyo, ryekan ti ralake ma byohe, “Iry nekre rola Ity

mane, ma rhe eraske o atyatke dakun. Ode ti bo ne kditlalanke, akwe it kimin ti ma kolnye iry mana aw desy kisike desikemo ana myorif nini nam. De lemamo kaditi sir toha bo ne, kali mamak de rlol simatare ti rbul aw desike kisike ma ra desikemo ana rmorif nini nam.”

Lemade Hulasow YANWE yesak sir toha bo mamin Edenke krala desy ma rbetik, ma ti robak lasmyer salik ma rnoha boluhu-boel ti. Kali iry desike Hulasokwe ika i toha lasmyerke, lemade ti lasmyer ne yobak kotnwo abu toha dakun.
Maktei bonyo, Hulasokwe tyutuk iry manosy sra-are

ti a Edenke kseri timur desy ma ralaka bo Edenke. Ode tyutuk kray a madelahke ma khyet ti de khyet ma ti desy, ma kdyotar eta sal mabai boke kralake, ma kete irire rsukar ti rbul aw desy kisi manety mormyorif nini namke.
Seure kiliku i ma Adam yenah yor sawa, desikeo sawa-na yor tenanke. Lemadendye idur hah bonyo, ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Kain,
kali wamfwet desike tyanuk de byohe, “Kutot naman wamwany ne kali Hulasow YANWE lyobak yaw.”

Ode klia seure huruk bonyo wamfwet desike yor tenanke ma idur hah bonyo, ananke wamwany a i huruk, lemade raki anike ti Habel, ma Kain wai amury a i. Habel neke karyaake, ilaka heal mamaruh nekre, klala Kain neke nyoha bo.
Sekwe it bonyo Kain neke yal wasi bo a kisinare ma yabar ode yalela ti a Hulasow YANWE.

Ode Habel yala ktela desy dakun, keskye yal dombanare anat ausw mamsun eras nekre ma kyety a sir ma yal kisi mamin-mamin nekre ma yabar ode yalela ti Hulasokwe. Dendye Hulasow YANWE dyakin Habel wasi ktela desy,
klala lema you Kain wasi ktelake. Lemade Kain ralake atyat ode matake masbu.
Dendye Hulasow YANWE tyanuk ti Kain de byohe, “Kyanmwane ralamkwe atyat ode matamkwe masbu ne de?
Kolnye mala ktela eraske mo lema mumukmuka o e? Keskyede mubrai mala ktela eraske, lemade lim o sal neke kikitkita ma ksyukar ti khyareta o. Lemamo malkyaw o ma ktela atyat desy mbwisak ba.”
Keskyede sekwe it huruk bonyo, Kain ryubut wai amury a Habel ma byohe, “Mmwa ma ituru tbai boke.” Lemade deruke rbai bo desy, ma ti ranait bo desy bonyo, Kain yoban a hyunw a wai amury Habel.
Dendye Hulasow YANWE yena Kain de byohe, “Kain o! Waimw amury a Habel neke ika?”
Bonyo Kain a hyalas I de byohe, “Mbwe. Lema khwe i. De mbwu ma ksweak i dakun e?”

Lemade Hulasow YANWE tyanuk ti Kain huruk ma byohe, “Kyanmwane muala ktela atyat maoly ne de? Waimw amurkye myaty ma larake kibo ti lasmyer ne. Ode larake kyabw kyosy a lasmyer ne ma Yaw, ma kbyu ma koil ti o.
Lemadendye kala tnyetakke ti o ma lema mnwoha lasmyer ne de, kali lasmyer neke ktyel a waimw amurkye larake ti kyoat a mutabahunw a i desy.

Ode kolnye mnwoha bo ti lasmyer ne, desikemo lasmyer neke ana lema kika kisi ti o mamak kola heitlulswo. De ana mola iry a lema maka wenat nekre, de ti de ba de ma o bo, kali lema muka wenamw a mlay ti lasmyer ne khahake.”
Lemade Kain a byu ti Hulasow YANWE de byohe, “Hulasow O, tnyetak mutunik ma yaw neke mdedan a ksyalik ma lema khwar a kal.

Mane mesak a yaw toha lasmyer ne, ma ana soso lahuk yaw toha O, ma kola dene iry mamesan malakut ti de malakut ma nekre, ma lema kuka wenakw a mlay ti lasmyerke khaha ne. Ode kolnye iry dum a rait yaw mo, rtabahunw a yaw bo.”

Lemadendye Hulasow YANWE tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Ana lema koldyesy, de kolnye irire rait a o ma rbu ma rtabahunw a o, desikemo kala tnyetakke ti sir kdi a kla-itw elik.” Maktei bonyo Hulasow YANWE yatosa Kain ma bya nini kolnye irire dum a rait a i, desikemo kete rtabahunw a i.
Ode Hulasokwe itun a yor Kain maktei bonyo, Kain a bya toha Hulasow YANWE ma bya ti tyenas ti Eden kseri timurke, neke wen desy kani Nod.

Seure kiliku i, desikeo Kain yenah yor sawa, lemade sawa-na yor tenanke. Lemadendye idur hah bonyo, ananke wamwany a i ma raki anike ti Henokh. Kyoat desy dakun o Kain a syadiri hnuke it, lemadendye yaki ti Henokh ma khyah a ananke anike.
Henokh neke ananke ani a Irad, ode Irad neke ananke ani Mehuyael, ode Mehuyael neke ananke ani Metusael, ode Metusael neke ananke ani Lamekh.
Ode Lamekh neke isa-ru ma ita ani Ada, ode idake ani Zila.
Desikeo Ada neke idur hah bonyo, ananke wamwany a i ma raki anike ti a Yabal. Ode Yabal neke ebnwo anan iry mamuna maka lasyery ma ramin ti ma ralaka biby o domba o saby.
Yabal neke wai amurkye ani Yubal, ma Yubal neke ebnwo anan a sir ne rala rhe leklekke, ma rohu rhe hluitke, ode rritik a rhe juk o nam.
Klala Zila idur hah, desike bonyo ananke wamwany a i ma ani Tubal-Kain. Tubal-Kain neke ebnwo anan sir ne rala rhe yaby a hnutan o soly o nam nekre. Ode Tubal-Kain neke rahyeta-na ani a Naama.

Sekwe it bonyo, Lamekh tyanuk ti sawa deruke de byohe, “Ada mor Zila, sawakw e, mlyika molumire ma mtyomolu nam kutanuk ne! Nenmo ktwabahunw a lyalakwe it, kali yoban yaw. Lyalaw neke yala yaw ma kumnu, dendye ktwabahunw a i elik.

Kolnye dum a rares ma rtabahunw a Kain, desikemo rtunik atyatke ti sir kdi a kla-itw. Keskye kolnye ti yaw mo, iry mares ma matabahunw a yaw ne, desikeo ana rtunik atyatke ti sir neke karyarike hean-itw kresi itw elik.”

Seure kiliku i, desikeo Adam yenah yor sawa, lemade sawa-na yor tenanke huruk. Lemadendye idur hah bonyo, ananke wamwany a i. Ode Hawa byohe, “Hulasokwe yal namanke it ma yaw huruk ma yeluk Habel, kali Kain tyabahunw a i de. Lemade kaki anike ti Set.”
Ode Set lyean ma lan i bonyo, isa ma ika anan, desyo ananke wamwany a i ma yaki anike ti Enos. Ode kyoat Enos radur ti i, nenmo irire rabuk Hulasokwe Anike ti “
” ma rleru I.
Adam yor tesnwo natu ne, rkesy anitare. Kyoat Hulasokwe ika iry deru desy, desikeo ika sir ma rola I dakun.
Hulasokwe ika sir neke, wamwankye ode wamfwetke. Lemade Hulasokwe yal eraske ti sir, ode byohe, “Irire sir ne.”
Adam wasi ainke atw ksala hean-telw (130) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah huruk, desikeo ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti a Set. Naman desike uno mata ne kola ama Adam.
Adam wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe walw (800) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Adam sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Adam wasi ainke kyait a atkwe siw ksala hean-telw (930), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Set wasi ainke atw kresi enasim (105) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Enos.
Set wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe walw kresi itw (807) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Set sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Set wasi ainke kyait a atkwe siw ksala hean a kresi enaru (912), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Enos wasi ainke hean-siw (90) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Kenan.
Enos wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe walw ksala hean a kresi enasim (815) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Enos sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Enos wasi ainke kyait a atkwe siw kresi enasim (905), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Kenan wasi ainke hean-itw (70) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Mahalaleel.
Kenan wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe walw ksala hean-at (840) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Kenan sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Kenan wasi ainke kyait a atkwe siw ksala hean (910), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Mahalaleel wasi ainke hean-nem a kresi enasim (65) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Yared.
Mahalaleel wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe walw ksala hean-telw (830) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Mahalaleel sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Mahalaleel wasi ainke kyait a atkwe walw ksala hean-siw kresi enasim (895), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Yared wasi ainke atw ksala hean-nem a kresi enaru (162) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Henokh.
Yared wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe walw (800) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Yared sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Yared wasi ainke kyait a atkwe siw ksala hean-nem a kresi enaru (962), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Henokh wasi ainke hean-nem a kresi enasim (65) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Metusalah.
Henokh wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe enatelw (300) huruk, ode sew kyaki nekre ika lui yor Hulasokwe. Ode ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Henokh sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Henokh ika lui yor Hulasokwe nini wasi ainke atkwe enatelw ksala hean-nem a kresi enasim (365), desikeo lema imin, kali Hulasokwe syalak a i.
Ode kyoat Henokh ika lui yor Hulasokwe nini wasi ainke atkwe enatelw ksala hean-nem a kresi enasim (365), desikeo lema imin, kali Hulasokwe syalak a i.
Ode kyoat a Metusalah wasi ainke atw ksala hean-walw kresi itw (187) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Lamekh.
Metusalah wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe itw ksala hean-walw kresi enaru (782) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Metusalah sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Metusalah wasi ainke kyait a atkwe siw ksala hean-nem a kresi siw (969), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat a Lamekh wasi ainke atw ksala hean-walw kresi enaru (182) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i.
Dendye Lamekh yaki anike ti Nuh,
ode byu de byohe, “Naman neke ana kibai lulkwe ne yarana ity hesatare ti takarya mdedan ti lasmyer a YANWE ituhar ba ne.”
Lamekh wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe enasim a ksala hean-siw kresi enasim (595) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Lamekh sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode Lamekh wasi ainke kyait a atkwe itw ksala hean-itw kresi itw (777), desikeo myaty.
Ode kyoat Nuh wasi ainke atkwe enasim (500), desikeo anan wamwankye enatelw sir, neke Sem, Ham, ode Yafet.
Kyoat desikeo irire rmel ma ribun ratut sir ti nuske ktem ne, ma dum a radur hahak naman wamfwetare.
Lemade Hulasokwe wasi irire rosy laitke,
ma ratos naman wamfwetare ti lasmyerke khaha neke mo eras sir a ksyalik, dendye rseak radakinare ma rasaa ror sir.
Dendye YANWE tyanuk ma byohe, “Memeakkwe ana lema ktyenas ti irkye nini nam, kali larke khatu i bo, lemade ana imorif neke wasi ainke kyait atw ksala hean-ru (120) bo.”

Kyoat desike ode kiba knaru desy, neke Hulasokwe wasi irire rosy laitke ma rasaa ror naman wamfwet desikre, ma wamfwet desikre radur hahak namanare ti iry manosy lait desikre. Ode naman desikre rlean ma lan de lan sir ode malkyakaw sir ma rambrebat ode rba tantyany.
Lemadendye YANWE yatos irire ma rala tot atyatare ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode nam rarekan ti ralat a kralanare neke kyety atyatke kimesmesan,
dendye YANWE ralake ksyal ti ktela iatos desy, lemade syesal a I o ika irkye ti lasmyer ne.

Dendye YANWE tyanuk ma byohe, “Ana kswoly o kswarah nam ribun kuala ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, neke iry o, heal malamy o, mamaruh o, mata mnas nekre, rtabal manu mamin sra nekre, kali kswesal ti kuala sir ne.”
Keskyede ti YANWE ralake kralake kdyakin a Nuh.
Nuh wasi mormyorifke ne: Nuh neke iry mlakye, ode lema yala ktela atyatare kola iry mamorif ti taras desy, ode Nuh neke ika lui yor Hulasokwe.
Ode Nuh ananke enatelw ma wamwany a sir mumu, neke Sem, Ham ode Yafet.
Ode kyoat desy dakun o Hulasokwe yatos o lasmyerke khaha ne kbyenw ti tot atyatare, ode ral resatare ma rataut ti rataut ma.
Ode Hulasokwe yatos mo lasmyerke khaha neke atyat bain-bain de, kali iry mamin ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu neke, rmorif ti atyatke kmyesan bo.

Dendye Hulasokwe tyanuk ti Nuh ma byohe, “Kohut maktei de, ana ktwabahunw nam mamorif nekre mumu, kali lasmyerke khaha ne kbyenw ti iry mahature ma rares ma rala koikay. Lemade, mtwomolu! Kala ma kswoly o kswarah sir a ror lasmyerke khaha ne ba!
De adoko muka batbatak lan de lanke it ti o, neke kyosy a aw a gofirke. Ode batbatak desike muka ma kika kloka it kloka it, ode mal terke ma mswimak a keta o krala ma ktem a ktem.
Ode muka batbatak desy mo knaruke reke hean-itw kresi enasim (75), ode kahelnanke reke hean a kresi enaru oktera (12,5), ode katkanake reke itw ktera (7,5).

Ode mkwahat eta batbatak desy ma kete ktem, de kika klelan, neke sentike hean-at a kresi enasim (45) kyosy a srake ei ktenanke. Maktei o muka holholatke ti kserike, ode muka batbatak desy ma kika kdadi ma sra o hah ode kditlan.
Kali mlay bain o Yaw ne ana kala wer maluburke ma kyahat eta lasmyerke khaha ne, ma ktyabahunw a nam mamea nekre ti laitke hah ne, ma nam mamin lasmyerke khaha ne rmaty mumu.
Keskyede Yaw ne ktwetak maktei de, ma ana mswukar ei batbatak desy kralake mor sawamw, ode anamure ror sawatare.

Ode kyosy a heal salno salik mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu neke, wamfwet wamwany ana rma ma rait a o, ma mal sir ei batbatakke krala desy ma rmorif ror a o. Mnwenas ma kyosy a manu salno salik, ode heal salno salik lan o kakan, ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, ana mal wamfwet wamwany ma maorif a sir.

Ode kyosy a heal salno salik mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu neke, wamfwet wamwany ana rma ma rait a o, ma mal sir ei batbatakke krala desy ma rmorif ror a o. Mnwenas ma kyosy a manu salno salik, ode heal salno salik lan o kakan, ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, ana mal wamfwet wamwany ma maorif a sir.
Ode muwahuk kotw sai ta sai kyalamo ra o renw ma resamy, ode mswosan ti batbatakke krala desy, ma ana mi ode heal desikre ra dakun.”
Lemadendye Nuh tyoha haret Hulasokwe itanuk ti i desikre mumu ma yala maktei de.
Lemade YANWE byu ti Nuh de byohe, “Mor a wasimw sekye kralake msyukar ei batbatakke krala desy, kali katos ti iry taras ne mo mmwesan a mlay a o.

Lemade kolnye, ktyoha heal a salno salik rasusinare, mal wamfwet wamwany neke ratsam-ratsam toha sir ma muhanun a sir, klala heal a salno salik lema rasusinare mal wamfwet wamwany neke raitw-raitw toha sir ma muhanun a sir. Maktei o kyosy manu salno salik nekre, mal wamfwet wamwany neke raitw-raitw toha sir ma muhanun a sir dakun, ma heal nekre rmorif ma rbenw a lasmyerke khaha ne.

Lemade kolnye, ktyoha heal a salno salik rasusinare, mal wamfwet wamwany neke ratsam-ratsam toha sir ma muhanun a sir, klala heal a salno salik lema rasusinare mal wamfwet wamwany neke raitw-raitw toha sir ma muhanun a sir. Maktei o kyosy manu salno salik nekre, mal wamfwet wamwany neke raitw-raitw toha sir ma muhanun a sir dakun, ma heal nekre rmorif ma rbenw a lasmyerke khaha ne.
Kali lenla sekwe itw bonyo, knwauk us lan ne ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ma kyal nini sekwe hean-at. Ma nam kuala mamin lasmyerke khaha ne kswoly o kswarah ba mumu.”
Lemade Nuh tyoha haret YANWE itanuk ti i desikre mumu.
Kyoat a Hulasokwe iala wer maluburke ma kbyenw lasmyerke khaha ne mumu bonyo, Nuh wasi ainke atkwe nem (600).
Lemade Nuh yor sawa ode ananare ror sawatare, rsukar ei batbatakke krala desy ma kete wer maluburke ktyabahunw a sir.
Maktei bonyo heal salno salik lema rasusinare ode rasusinare, rtabal manu salno salik lema rasusinare ode rasusinare ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu,
neke wamfwet wamwany rahanun a sir ode rma ma rsukar ei batbatakke krala desy ma rait Nuh. Ma ktyoha haret Hulasokwe itanuk ti Nuhke.
Lemadendye sekwe itw kyolak eta bonyo, Hulasokwe yala werke ma klyubur ma kbyenw lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.
Kyoat a Nuh wasi ainke atkwe nem, ode ti sew a hean a kresi itkwe ti hul enaruke, desikeo lasmyerke kimnan ma wer a kmatanare klyubur ma ksyorw a lasmyerke khaha ne, ode laitke kele rsin
ma us lanke kdi kola dene kele rhodi wer laitke ei hahke ma kyal nini sekwe hean-at.
Kyoat sew desy dakun o, Nuh yor sawa, ode anan detelw desike, neke Sem, Ham, ode Yafet, ror sawatare rsukar a kmuna ei batbatakke krala desy ma ramin ti.
Ode manu o heal mamaruh o mata mnas, kakan o lan, rtabal heal malamy ti lasmyerke khaha ne dakun;
neke manu o heal salno salik a mamea nekre rahanun wamfwet wamwany, ma rma ma rsukar ei batbatak desy ma rait Nuh.
Heal o manu desikre rma ma rsukar mumu ma kola haret Hulasokwe itanuk ti Nuhke. Maktei bonyo, YANWE hyolat eta holholat batbatak desy.
Ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, wer malubur desike ksyai ma kyal nini sekwe hean-at. Lemade wer desike ksyai ma kyamanuk batbatak desy ma kimanw-kimanw.
Ode wer desike ksyai-ksyai toha ma lan ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ma batbatak desike kimanw-manw ti werke khaha desy.
Ode wer desike ksyai de ksyai nini atat a ksyalik ma khyalodur lasmyerke khaha ne, ma kkyahat eta huar atat mamin a lasmyerke khaha ne mumu,
ma wer malubur desike kbyilak huar a ktutunare, neke mabilakke reke enatelw ktera.
Lemadendye nam ribun lan mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne, rmaty mumu, neke manu o heal a mamaruh o, mata mnas o, malamy nekre rtabal iry ribun mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.
Mane nam ribun lan mamea ti lasmyerke khaha neke rmaty mumu ma teit.

Lemadendye nam ribun lan mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu neke, iry o, heal o, manu o, heal malamy o nam nekre, Hulasokwe tyabahunw o yaha sir mumu. Klala mamin ti batbatakke krala desy, neke Nuh yor sawa o anan o sobai, rtabal a heal o manu ranor sir desikre rmesan a rmorif bo.
Ode sekwe atw ksala hean-sim (150), wer malubur desike kkyahat eta lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.
Keskye Hulasokwe nyenas Nuh tyabal heal mata mnas o mamaruh manor i ti batbatakke krala desy, lemade Hulasokwe yala eskwe ma kyohw ti werke khaha desy, ma khyury ma wer desike kyala ma kyorw.
Maktei o Hulasokwe kkyahat eta wer a kmatanare ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, ktyabal wer mamin ti laitke, ma us lan ne lema kyoras de.
Ode wer desike kyorw-kyorw toha, nini sekwe atw ksala hean-sim kyolak eta,
ti sew hean a kresi itkwe ti hul itkwe krala desy bonyo, batbatak desike kele rsaa ti huarare ti Ararat.
Desikeo wer lan desike kyorw-kyorw ei hahke ma kyait hul heanke, ode ti sew mamunake ti hul hean desy bonyo, huar a ktuhunare kyar.
Ode sekwe hean-at a kyolak eta bonyo, Nuh lyakat jendela kakan mamin ti batbatak desy,
ma tyunik manu alalke it, keskye lema yulak a i, de nyem ti de nyem ma bo, nini wer desike kmyety ma bakbak ti lasmyerke khaha ne.
Lemadendye tyunik huruk manu hahkye it ma ti byihy o kete werke bakbak ti lasmyerke khaha ne de.

Keskyede manu hahy desike lema itot wen ma tyuny, lemade nyem ma yulak a i mai batbatak desy, kali ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu werke lenla bakbak. Dendye Nuh lyol simake ti kyumak manu desy ma yal i ei batbatakke kralake.
Maktei bonyo Nuh ikita sekwe itw huruk, nenmo tyunik manu hahy desy huruk toha batbatakke kralake.

Ode kinohnoh ti sekwe iba bonyo, manu desike yulak i huruk ma yait Nuh, desyo mya o kyuty aw a zaitunke ksitu mur ne sasam! Lemade Nuh nenmo hye o wer malubur ti lasmyerke khaha ne kyala ma bakbak mumu de.
Maktei o, Nuh ikita sekwe itw huruk ma kisakut bonyo, tyunik manu hahy desy huruk, keskyede lema yulak i ma yait Nuh ti batbatak desy.

Ode ti Nuh wasi ainke krala atkwe nem a kresi sasam desy, ti sew mamuna ti hul sasamke, neke wer malubur ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu ne bakbak. Lemadendye Nuh lyakat batbatakke khahake tebikan, ma yatos ti yatos ma, desyo lasmyerke khaha ne mumu bakbak bain de!
Ode ti hul enaruke krala desy, ti sew a hean-ru a kresi itkwe, neke wer malubur ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu ne bakbak keskes.
Lemade Hulasokwe tyanuk ti Nuh de byohe,
“Nuh! Mor sawamw o, anamw, ode anamure sawatare mbyetik toha batbatakke krala desy.
Ode mtyabal heal mamorif minor desikre, neke manu o, heal mamaruh o, mata mnas o, heal malamy desikre, mor sir ma miktemtem a mbyetik ei mloskye, ma ana rmel ma rbenw lasmyerke khaha ne.”
Lemade Nuh yor sawa ode ananare ror sawatare,

rtabal heal mamaruh o, heal mata mnas o, manu o, heal malamy desikre, ror nam ribun mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne raktemtem mumu, ktyoha wamfwet wamwany rahanun desikre ror anatare ma rbetik toha batbatakke kralake ei mloskye.
Lemade Nuh yal hature ma syadiri lat raeh heal ti Hulasokwe, ode yilik heal lema rasusinare dum ode manu lema rasusinare dum dakun, ma yal sir ma yeh a sir ti akye, ma yabar ti YANWE.

Kyoat YANWE ilos a nam Nuh iabar desikre ma kihon a mtelas bonyo, YANWE tyanuk ti ralake de byohe, “Ana lema kuhnutuk lasmyerke khaha ne de, khyali irire totat atyatare. Khwe ohe irire rala rosy kakan sirke nam rarekanare atyat, keskyede ana lema kkwordalam nam ribun lan mamorif nekre de, kola nenmo kuala selsel ne.
Lemade lasmyerke khaha ne ana kibai lulkwe neke, ana kika sewah o msarin, mrin o manas, sew ratan o rakety, ode leman o us, neke lema kimres elik.”
Hulasokwe yal eraske ti Nuh yor ananare, ode byu ti sir de byohe, “Mika ebnwo anamy ma mmyel ma mbyenw ti lasmyerke khaha ne.
Ode heal mamin lasmyerke khaha ne, ode manu manem ti sra nekre, rtabal heal malamy o, masy mamin ti tasi nekre, ana raktemtem a ramtaut e a ksyalik. Ode kal sir ti e ma mhyareta sir mumu.
Ode heitlulswo kal tnyei o aw ktahran molmol nekre ti e ma mi o myenw bo, keskye senweke, ktwabal heal o ail ribun mamorif nekre mumu ma mi o myenw sir dakun.
Keskye kete mi heal a kisi lar o wahar mamin ti a nggora desikre, kali morif ne desi lar desy.
Lemade kala tnyetakke ma kolnye irkye tyabahunw irkye, desyo kal larake ma kyeluk lar desy! Ode heal matabahunw irkye, desyo kal heal desy larake ma kyeluk iry desy larake dakun.
Kali kuka irkye ma yola Yaw, lemadendye kabei tyabahunw irkye, desyo tnyetakke ma rtabahunw a i dakun!
Ode mnyenas, ei neke mika ebnwo anamy ma mmyel ma mbyenw ti lasmyerke khaha ne. Ou, ma ribun ratut e ma lema raki ral aryarimkye.”
Maktei o Hulasokwe tyanuk ti Nuh yor ananare huruk de byohe,
“Mtyomolu, kyala kyosy ne, kuhatetak kor o a mor tesnwo natumw,
mtyabal heal mabetik toha batbatakke krala desy, neke manu o, heal mata mnas o, mamaruh o, malamy nekre, ktyabal heal ribun ana mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.
Ma tnyetak kutanukke kolnye, kyala kyosy ne, nam ribun mamorif nekre, wer maluburke ana lema ktyabahunw sir mumu de, ode ana lema kala wer maluburke ma kihnutuk lasmyerke khaha ne huruk de.”

Lemade Hulasokwe byu ti Nuh yor ananare ma byohe, “Myatos wasikw keke desy. Ktwutuk i ti oanke, ma kyeluk nyatos kuhatetak kor e a myor a heal mamorif manor e nekre, ktyabal lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, ma ti kiba knaru ne ti tesnwo natumy ana mamin ti nuske ktem ne mumu.

Lemade Hulasokwe byu ti Nuh yor ananare ma byohe, “Myatos wasikw keke desy. Ktwutuk i ti oanke, ma kyeluk nyatos kuhatetak kor e a myor a heal mamorif manor e nekre, ktyabal lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, ma ti kiba knaru ne ti tesnwo natumy ana mamin ti nuske ktem ne mumu.
Seure rait de kala oan metmetke ti laitke, ode kolnye kekeke byetik ti oan desy,
desikeo knwenas kal nam kuhatetak kunor e ne, mtyabal a heal mamorif nekre, ma ana lema kala wer lan maluburke, ma ktyabahunw nam ribun lan mamorif nekre mumu de.
Ma kolnye keke desike byetik ti oanke, ode kuatos bonyo, knwenas kal wasikw tnyetak kunor nam ribun lan mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu, ti kiba knaru ne.”
Lemadendye Hulasokwe byu ti Nuh de byohe, “Ou, keke desike ksyusu nyatos a kuhatetak kunor nam mamorif ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu.”
Nuh anan mabetik toha batbatakke krala desy neke: Sem, Ham, ode Yafet. (Ham neke Kanaan ama i.)
Nuh anan detelw desy rmel ma rahe a rasakar sir ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ma iry mamorif ti nuske ktem ne mumu neke, ity ebnwo matrumat a sir.
Nuh neke iry manoha bo i, ode i ne iala bo tasy maiskye kmuna ne.
Ode ienw taskye kwen makitkye bonyo kyala i ma yonuk wasi rabit narnarkwe ma imlehleh, ode yenah ti wasi lasyerkye kralake.
Desikeo Ham (Kanaan ama) ne iatos ma ama-na imleh bonyo, bya ti ihes ti wai deru desy ti mloskye.

Lemadendye Sem yor Yafet ral rabit narnarw desy ma rta ti deruke hesatare, ma rlakut a rsuka sir ei lasyerkye kralake, ode ral rabit narnarw desy ma rkahat eta amatke, ode deruke rulak matatare ma lema ratos amatke, kali amatke imleh.
Ode kyoat Nuh ihe toha lbweta ma ibatar bonyo nenmo hye ktela anan amurkye iala ti desy,
dendye byu de byohe,
“Lemamo Hulasokwe tyuhar Kanaan ma ika at ti wainare.”
Maktei o Nuh byu huruk de byohe,
“Klweru YANWE, Hulasow a Sem isob tike. Kuten ma kibai lulkwe ne Kanaan yor tesnwo natu raka at ti Sem yor tesnwo natu.

Ode Hulasow O, kuten ma mahelak wen a Yafet imin tike ma helhela halhyali, ode mal Yafet tesnwo natu ma ror Sem tesnwo natu ma ramin ti Sem wasi lasyerire. Keskyede kibai lulkwe ne mala Kanaan ma tesnwo natu raka at ti Yafet tesnwo natu dakun.”
Kyala kyosy wer malubur desy, Nuh wasi ainke ktyabal atkwe enatelw ksala hean-sim (350).
Dendye Nuh wasi ainke kyait atkwe siw ksala hean-sim (950), desikeo myaty.
Kyoat wer maluburke kimres, desikeo Sem, Ham, ode Yafet sawatare radur hahak namanare ti sir. Ma klyosu Sem, Ham, ode Yafet tesnwo natut sir ne rakesy a anitare ne.
Yafet tesnwo natu sir ne: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Yawan, Tubal, Mesekh, ode Tiras.
Gomer tesnwo natu sir ne: Askenas, Rifat, ode Togarma.
Yawan tesnwo natu sir ne: Elisa, Tarsis, iry mamin ti Kit-are, ode iry mamin ti Dodan-are.
Iry nekre, sir ne rahe a rasakar sir ma raka hnu ti namwatake khahake ne.
Iry desikre mumu neke, Yafet tesnwo natu sir, ma ktyoha wait sei kralanare, ktyoha wait telare, ktyoha wait lasmyerare, ode ktyoha wait hnuare.
Ode Ham tesnwo natu sir ne: Kusy, Misraim, Put, ode Kanaan.
Kusy tesnwo natu sir ne: Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Raema, ode Sabtekha.
Raema ananare sir ne: Syeba yor Dedan.
Kusy sawa-na idur hah huruk ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Nimrod, iry neke i ne ihareta kmunmuna ti lasmyerke khaha ne.

Nimrod neke YANWE syaluk i ma imbrebat ma idoha ti de idoha ma. Mane kyalamo irire ral i ma ratani i ti iry salik ma rbohe, “Anakyai YANWE syaluk o ma mumbrebat ma mudoha ti de mudoha ma kola Nimrod.”
Khyehyeike hyareta hnu Babelke, hnu Erekhke, ode hnu Akadke, ma hnu nekre mumu neke kimin a lasmyer Sinearke.
Kyoat Nimrod hyareta o lasmyer Sinearke bonyo, byai lasmyer Asyurke, ti syadiri hnu a Niniweke, Rehoboth-Irke, Kalahke,
ode hnu Resenke dakun. Hnu Resen neke kimin ti a hnu Niniweke ode hnu lan Kalah desike klelanke.
Ode Misraim sawa-na idur hahak iry a Lud-are, iry a Anam-are, iry a Lehab-are, iry a Naftuh-nare,
iry a Patrus-are, iry a Kasluh-nare, ode iry a Kaftor-are. Iry a Kasluh nekre Filistin-are ebnwo matrumat sir.
Ode Kanaan sawa-na idur hahak iry a Sidon-are (Sidon neke Kanaan anan ausw a i), iry a Het-are,
iry a Yebusi-nare, iry a Amori-nare, iry a Girgas-are,
iry a Hewi-nare, iry a Arki-nare, iry a Sini-nare,
iry a Arwadi-nare, iry a Semari-nare, rtabal iry a Hamati-nare. Kanaan ne yor tesnwo natut nekre rmel ma sir ne rahe a rasakar sir ma ktyoha wait sei kralanare,
ma nusatke kyala kyosy a Sidon, ma kbyakola Gerar, ma ti kyait Gaza, maktei o kbyakola Sodom o Gomora, Adma, ode Zeboim, ma ti kyait o Lasa.
Iry desikre mumu neke, Ham tesnwo natu sir, ma ktyoha wait sei kralanare, ktyoha wait telare, ktyoha wait lasmyerare, ode ktyoha wait hnuare.
Sem neke Yafet wai ausw a i, ode iry a Eber-are ebnwo matrumat Sem.
Ode Sem ananare sir ne: Elam, Asyur, Arpakhsad, Lud, ode Aram.
Aram ananare sir ne: Us, Hul, Geter, ode Mas.
Arpakhsad sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i ma raki anike ti Selah, ode Selah sawa-na idur hah ma ananke ani Eber.
Ode Eber sawa-na idur hah ma anan wamwankye enaru sir ma auskwe raki anike ti Peleg,
kali kyoat taras radur ti i desy bonyo, iry mamin nuske ktem ne rahe a rasakar sir. Ode wai amurkye ani a Yoktan.
Yoktan ananare sir ne: Almodad, Selef, Hasarmawet, Yerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimael, Syeba,
Ofir, Hawila, ode Yobab. Sir ne mumu neke Yoktan anan sir.
Yoktan tesnwo natu sir ne ramin ti lasmyer malol i bai Mesa ma kbyakola huarare ti Sefar, neke o a kseri timurke.
Iry desikre mumu neke, Sem tesnwo natu sir, ma ktyoha wait sei kralanare, ktyoha wait telare, ktyoha wait lasmyerare, ktyoha wait hnuare.

Iry rakesy ti nekre Nuh tesnwo natu sir, ma ktyoha ananare wait sei kralanare, ode wait hnuare. Ode kyala kyosy wer maluburke kimety desy ma ti kinait selsel ne, hnu mamin ti nuske ktem ne mumu neke rosy a Nuh ananare wait sei kralanare.
Kyoat wer maluburke ktei ma ainare kiliku i bonyo, iry mamin lasmyerke khaha ne mumu neke ral tel sasamke, ma wait tun a khatunare mais.
Lemade riar ma rbakola kseri timurke desikeo rait lasmyer maiske o a lasmyer Sinearke, dendye rmon ti wen desy.
Iry desikre it de byu ti it de byohe, “Mmya ma tba ti tal rayahkwe ma tala hatw batanare ode teh ma malkyakaw, ma bata desikre tal ma kyeluk hatw, ode tal terke ma tal ma tlatan bata desikre.”

Maktei bonyo rtanuk huruk de rbohe, “Mmya ma tawahuk ity ti ne ma tala hnu lanke it ma kete taskyui-taskyay ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode ti hnu lan desy mmya ma tsadiri sey atatke it ma kyait laitke ma taobak kanike.”
Malmata iry mamin ti lasmyerke khaha ne rsadiri sey atat desy bonyo, YANWE yorw ma yatos hnu desy ktyabal sey atat rasadiri desy,

lemade tyanuk ma byohe, “Iry nekre hnu sasam sir, ode tel sasam sir dakun. Mane khyehyeike o, sey atat rasadiri neke kamalkyau ne. Ode ana kiba knaru ne kolkya? Iry nekre rreky sai mo, ana kdi tike bo!
Lemamo torw
ba ti tahora-tasai wait telke, ma it de lema hye it wasi tel.”
Lemadendye YANWE iskyui-iskyay iry desikre ti nuske ktem ne mumu. Dendye ramres ma lema rala hnu lan desy.
Lemade kyala kyosy desy hnu lan desike raki kanike ti Babel
ma ti kyait senwe, kali ti desike YANWE ihora-isai tel mamin lasmyerke khaha ne, ode ti desike dakun o YANWE iskyui-iskyay iry desikre ti nuske ktem ne mumu.
Sem tesnwo natunare sir ne:
Wer maluburke kmyety, ode ainke enaru ktyabal huruk bonyo, Sem wasi ainke atkwe sasam (100), desikeo sawa-na idur hahak naman wamwankye it, ma raki anike ti Arpakhsad.
Sem wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enasim (500) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Sem sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Arpakhsad wasi ainke hean-telw kresi enasim (35) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Selah.
Arpakhsad wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enaat a kresi enatelw (403) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Arpakhsad sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Selah wasi ainke hean-telw (30) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Eber.
Selah wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enaat a kresi enatelw (403) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Selah sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Eber wasi ainke hean-telw kresi enaat (34) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Peleg.
Eber wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enaat a kresi hean-telw (430) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Eber sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Peleg wasi ainke hean-telw (30) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Rehu.
Peleg wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enaru a kresi siw (209) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Peleg sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Rehu wasi ainke hean-telw kresi enaru (32) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Serug.
Rehu wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enaru a kresi itw (207) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Rehu sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Serug wasi ainke hean-telw (30) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Nahor.
Serug wasi ainke ktyabal ma atkwe enaru (200) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Serug sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Nahor wasi ainke hean-ru a kresi siw (29) bonyo, sawa-na idur hah ma ananke wamwany a i, ma raki anike ti Terah.
Nahor wasi ainke ktyabal ma atw ksala hean a kresi siw (119) huruk, ma ti klelan ain desikre kieluk i, Nahor sawa-na idur hahak naman wamfwet o wamwany.
Ode kyoat Terah wasi ainke hean-itw (70) bonyo, sawa-na idur hahak anan wamwankye enatelw sir, neke Abram, Nahor, ode Haran.
Terah tesnwo natu sir ne:
Terah sawa-na idur hahak naman wamwankye enatelw, neke Abram, Nahor, ode Haran.
Ode Haran isa ma sawa-na idur hahak naman wamwankye it ma ani Lot, ode wamwhetke enaru neke Milka yor Yiska.
Kyoat Haran myaty ti nus radur i tike neke Ur-Kasdim, desikeo ama Terah myorif a nggora.
Ode Nahor isaa yor Milka, neke Haran anan a i. Klala Abram isaa yor wamwhetke it ma ani Sarai.
Keskyede Sarai neke myakw ma lema ika anan.
Lemadendye Terah yor anan Abram, ode sobai Sarai, rtabal ebu Lot, neke raktemtem a riar toha Ur-Kasdim ma rbai lasmyer Kanaanke, keskye ranait hnu Haranke bonyo rmon ti desy.
Ode Terah wasi ainke kyait atkwe enaru a kresi enasim (205) bonyo, myaty ti hnu desy.
YANWE tyanuk ti Abram ma byohe, “Abram, mtwutuk amno waimw, ktyabal amamu seike, ode mbwetik toha hnuamw ma mbwai lasmyer ana kususu ti oke.
Ana khwamela o ma nusamkwe lan, ode kal eraske ti o ma animkwe kimelir, ode khyali o, mane irire ratot eraske ne.

Ode kolnye irire ral eraske ti o, desikeo ana kal eraske ti sir dakun, klala kolnye irire rsusnwo soba o desikeo ana kal atyatke ti iry desikre dakun. Ode kyosy a o mane, iry mamin ti lasmyerke khaha ne mumu wait sey kralanare ratot eraske.”

Lemade Abram byetik toha hnu Haranke ma ktyoha YANWE tun itanuk ti iare. Desikeo Lot a tyoha Abram ma raktem a rbetik toha hnu desy dakun. Kyoat Abram byetik toha hnu Haranke desikeo wasi ainke kyait a hean-itw kresi enasim (75).

Abram a bya o yor sawa Sarai, ode Lot, neke Abram wai Haran ananke, ma rba o rety wait lan o hnutat ode ror wait atare, neke ral sir toha hnu Haranke, ma raktemtem a rbai lasmyer Kanaanke ti ramin ti.
Abram rlakut a rlola lasmyer desy ma ti rait aw lan de lanke it ma kimin ti lasmyer Moreke, neke lema soso toha hnu Shikemke. Kyoat desyo iry Kanaan-are ramin ti desy dakun.
Ti desike YANWE syusu I ti Abram, ode tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Ana kal lasmyer Kanaan ne ti tesnwo natumw.” Lemade Abram yal hature ma syadiri lat raeh heal ti YANWE, kali YANWE syusu tenanke ti Abram.

Lemadendye Abram syaur wasi laklakutke bai kseri tranke ti huarare o Betel kseri timurke. Ode rsadiri wait lasyerire ti hnu Betelke ode hnu Aike klelanke ma Betel kimin haratke, ode Ai kimin timurke. Ti desike dakun o yal hature ma syadiri lat raeh heal ti YANWE, ma syakitil ode syambayan ti YANWE.
Maktei bonyo Abram syaur huruk wasi laklakutke ma yosy wenke it ma byai wen idanare ma byakola lasmyer Kanaanke kseri tranke ma ti yait Negeb.
Kyoat desyo ti Kanaan neke lu o laar a ksyalik, dendye Abram byetik toha Negeb ma bya soso ei kseri tranke ti nus Mesirke ma imwakun ti.
Ode Abram rala ma rsukar Mesir, desikeo tyanuk ti sawa Sarai de byohe, “Yaw ne khwe ohe oi neke eras o a ksyalik.
Ode kolnye iry a Mesir-are ratos a o ana rbu de rbohe, oi neke sawakw a o, bonyo ana rtabahunw a yaw, ode rlura o ma mmworif.
Lemadendye kolnye rena o desikeo mbwohe rahyetakw a o, ma yaw neke rala eras yaw ode rlura yaw ma kmworif khyali o.”
Dendye Abram rsukar Mesir bonyo, iry Mesirare ratos a sir desikeo rbohe wamfwet desike eras i a ksyalik,
ode kyoat Firaun wasi melare ratos Sarai, desikeo rleru Sarai ersanke ti Firaun, lemade wamfwet desike ror i bai Firaun wasi sekye.
Ma ti ranait sekye bonyo, Firaun yala eras Abram kali dyakin wamfwet desy. Lemadendye Firaun yal a biby o, domba o, saby o, unta o, keledai wamfwet wamwany, ktyabal at wamfwet wamwany ti Abram.
Keskyede YANWE kyeyer kali Firaun yal Sarai Abram sawa desy. Lemade yal kbai atyat nekre ti Firaun, ktyabal iry mamin ti wasi sekye krala desy mumu.
Lemade Firaun yabuk Abram ma tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Abram o, kali tot sai ne muala ma yaw ne de? Kyanwmane lema mulosu de mbwohe sawamu i ne wamfwet ne de?
Ode kyanmwane mutanuk de mbwohe, wamfwet ne rahyetamw a i, ma khyury ma kal i ma kusaa kor i ne de? Lemade senweke mal sawamw, ode adoko mbya!”
Dendye Firaun yal haretke ti wasi irire ma rtian Abram yor sawa Sarai, ror wait atare, ktyabal lan o hnutat o wait biby o, domba o, saby o, unta o, keledai desikre mumu ma rbetik toha Mesir.

Lemade Abram byetik toha Mesir ma yulak i bai lasmyer Negebke yor sawa Sarai ktyabal wait lan o hnutat, ode biby o, saby o, domba rtabal wasi makaryaare, ode kyoat rabetik toha Mesir bonyo Lot tyoha sir dakun.
Abram neke wasi malolkye lan, ma wasi blyawan kunkuny o bokbok ribun, ktyabal wasi domba o, biby o, saby nekre ribun sir dakun.

Abram neke byai wenke it maktei o byai wenke it huruk, ma yosy a lasmyer Negebke ma yolik i bai lasmyerke it ti hnu Betelke ode hnu Aike klelanke, neke wen a kyoat inait a kmuna ma isadiri lasyerkye tike.
Lemadendye yal hature ma syadiri lat raeh heal ti YANWE, ode Abram syakitil ma syambayan ti YANWE ti desy.
Kyoat desyo Lot tyoha Abram dakun. Ma Lot neke wasi malolkye lan dakun neke ika wasi domba o, biby o, saby o lasyery, ktyabal wasi sekye kralake ode wasi makaryaare dakun.
Keskyede lasmyer ramin ti desike lema kyait ma raktem a ramin ti, kali wait lan o hnutat ribun, ktyabal wait domba o, biby o, saby nekre ribun sir ma lema raka wenat.
Ti desy dakun o iry Kanaan-are rtabal iry Feris-are radurak lasmyer desy. Ma lasmyer desike kbyenw ti irire. Dendye Abram yor Lot wait iry malaka healare railir khyali wenke.
Lemadendye Abram tyanuk ti Lot de byohe, “Oi neke anakw a o, ma lema eras ma tailir ode wasikw irire ror wasimw irire railir dakun, kali waiku anan a o.

Lemade matos, lasmyer neke lan a nggora ma tamin ti. Lemade kuten toha o ma lemamo tahe lasmyer ne, ode kyosy a o bo ma mdwakin ma milik lasmyer ne kseri kabei bo, ma kolnye mbwai kseri tranke desike bonyo ana kbwai kseri seryabke, dete kolnye mdwakin ma mbwai kseri timurke desikemo ana kbwai kseri haratke.”

Lemade Lot yatos ti de yatos ma ti ktebteban Yordanke ma ti kyait Zoar, neke lasmyer maiskye kmyesan, ode lasmyerke werwer kola lasmyer Mesirke, ode kola lasmyer bo Eden YANWE ialake dakun. Kyoat Lot yatos ti ktebteban Yordanke ne, desyo YANWE lenla syolyo syarah hnu Sodom o Gomora ba.
Lemade Lot yilik ktebteban Yordanke ktem desy mumu.
Dendye deruke rasali sir, ma Lot byai kseri timurke,
klala Abram imin ti lasmyer Kanaanke bo. Lemade Lot byai ktebteban Yordanke ti imin hnu a klelan desikre, ode yilik wenke it ma knyey hnu Sodomke ma syadiri wasi lasyerkye ti.
Ode hnu Sodom neke dakun o iry mamin tiare rahatw ksyalik, ode rasal ti YANWE.
Lemade kyoat Abram yor Lot rasali sir ma Lot iba bonyo, YANWE byu ti Abram de byohe, “Abram o, mbwitil matamkwe ode matos ei lasmyer a kseri timur so, harat so, tran so, ode seryab so,
kali lasmyer muatos desikre mumu neke ana kal ti o a mor tesnwo natumw ma wasimy ti kiba knaru ne.
Ode kal eraske ti o ma ana tesnwo natumw nekre ribun sir kola dene laran mamin namwatake ne.
Ma lema kika iry maaki kyal laran ne, kola dene ana tesnwo natumw lema kika iry maaki kyal sir dakun.
Lemadendye kyala kyosy neke mlwakut ma mulili lasmyer ne, kali ana kal lasmyer ne ti o mumu.”

Lemadendye Abram hyuty wasi lasyerkye huruk, ode bya ti syadiri ti aw lan de lan nekre krintyotanare ti Mamre wasi lasmyerke neke knyey a hnu Hebronke ma imin ti desy. Ode ti wen desike dakun o Abram yal hature ma syadiri lat raeh heal tike, ma kyalamo syob ti YANWE.
Kyoat desyo raja nus lanke enaat, neke raja Amrafel yosy nus Babiloniake, raja Ariokh yosy nus Elasarke, raja Kedorlaomer yosy nus Elamke, rtabal raja Tideal yosy nus Goyimke,

ode raja nus lan deat neke ramdiriat ror raja hnuke enasim, neke raja Bera yosy hnu Sodomke, raja Birsya yosy hnu Gomorake, raja Syinab yosy hnu Admake, raja Syemeber yosy hnu Zeboimke, rtabal raja hnu Belake, ma selsel ne hnu Bela neke rhaly ti Zoar.
Raja hnu desim neke ratun ma rawahuk wait suldatare ti ktebteban Sidimke, ma selsel neke rhaly o Tasi Mkeske.

Ktela neke kdi ti kali raja Kedorlaomer hyareta raja hnu desim desy kyal nini ainke hean a kresi enaru. Keskyede ti ain hean a kresi enatelkwe bonyo, raja hnu desim desike rawahuk sir ma rohut ma kete rtomolu toha i de.

Ode ti ain hean a kresi enaatke bonyo, raja Kedorlaomer yor raja matoha iare rtabal wait suldatare, rbetik toha nusatare ma ramdiriat ror iry Refa-are o a hnu Asyterot-Karnaimke, iry Zuz-are o a hnu Hamke, iry Em-are o a lasmyer Syawe-Kiryataimke,
ktyabal iry Hori-nare ti wait huarare ma kani a Seir. Ode raja Kedorlaomer radoha iry desikre nini rait El-Paran ti wen malosy-loskye kserike.
Maktei bonyo rulak sir mai En-Mispat, ma selsel neke rhaly ti Kadesh, ode rala ral iry Amalek-are ma rhareta iry desikre wait lasmyerke mumu, rtabal iry Amori mamin ti hnu Hazezon-Tamarke.

Lemadendye raja hnu desim ne, neke raja hnu Sodomke, raja hnu Gomorake, raja hnu Admake, raja hnu Zeboimke, rtabal raja hnu Belake, rawahuk wait suldatare ti ktebteban Sidimke ma ramdiry eta wait hnuare,

kali raja nus lan deat ne, neke raja Kedorlaomer yosy nus Elamke, raja Tideal yosy nus Goyimke, raja Amrafel yosy nus Babiloniake, ode raja Ariokh yosy nus Elasarke, rala ma rma ma ramdiriat ror raja hnu desim desy.

Ma ramdiriat bonyo, raja hnu desim desike lema malkyakaw sir, dendye rala toha inamdiriatke. Ode raja hnu Sodomke yor raja hnu Gomorake ror wait suldatare rala ti ktebteban Sidimke ma suldatare dum a rdi ei kuran ter a kralanare, kali ti ktebteban Sidimke ne, kuran ter-are kimin ti kabei ta kabei bo. Klala raja hnu idanare ror wait suldatare ra-la ti rabunw oa huarare.

Lemade raja nus deat mamdiriat manor sir desikre rbai hnu Sodomke ode hnu Gomorake ti rasoruk wait a lan o hnutat, ode ral wait saby o biby o domba o ktyabal hinat kotw o abw nekre ma ralaka ba mumu. Ode rkumak iry mamin ti wait sey kralanare ma ror sir ba dakun.
Kyoat desike dakun o raja desikre rkumak Lot, Abram wai-na anan desy, ktyabal wasi lan o hnutan o nam ribun lan nekre dakun, kali kyoat desike Lot imin o a hnu Sodomke.

Keskyede iry mala toha inamdiriatke it a ila ma mya ma ihes a ktela desikre mumu ti Abram, iry Ibrani desy. Kyoat desike Abram imin wenke it ma knyei Mamre iry Amori desike wasi aw lan de lan nekre. Ti desike dakun o Mamre yor wainare, neke Eskol ode Aner. Iry detelw ne ror Abram de kola ratutuk tun ma it de syaluk it.

Kyoat Abram itomolu britke ohe wai-na ananke rakumak i ti inamdiriatke kralake ne bonyo, yal haretke ti wasi iry mahe inamdiriat a ksalanare. (Iry nekre radur hahak sir ti Abram wasi lasyerire, neke aryaritke atkwe enatelw ksala hean a kresi walw (318).) Lemade Abram ror sir de radoha raja nus deat desike ror wait suldatare ma ti rait hnu Danke.

Ode sewahke bonyo, Abram yor wasi irire raka darkye eta sir ma rhou iry desikre ror wait suldatare, ma Abram wasi irire rala ral sir ma radoha sir ma ti rait a Hoba, neke kimin ti hnu Damsyikke kseri seryabke.

Maktei bonyo Abram rulak sir ma rma ma ral a rolik iry a Sodom o Gomora wait lan o hnutat o nam ribun lan nekre mumu, ma ral Lot wai-na anan desy dakun ktyabal wasi lan o hnutan o nam nekre, ode ral dakun a wamfwet o iry rakumak ti inamdiriatke krala desy.

Ode Abram yala yal raja Kedorlaomer yor raja manor iare maktei bonyo, yolik i toha inamdiriatke. Desike bonyo raja hnu Sodomke byetik ma mya ma ikita i ti Ktebteban Syaweke, neke kyalamo rhaly o Ktebteban Rajake.
Ode Melkisedek neke raja hnu Salemke, ode i neke iry mabaa klen ti irkye yor Hulasow Lan Lahukke. Kyoat desyo mya dakun ma yety rotkye ktyabal tasy maiskye kwen makitkye ti Abram.
Maktei bonyo yal eraske ti Abram ma byohe,
“Kuten Hulasow Lan Lahuk maala lait o lasmyerke khaha ne ma yal eraske ti Abram oi ne.
Ode klweru Hulasow Lan Lahukke anike, kali yal malkyakakwe ti o ma mala mal iry mumdiriat munor sirare.”
Lemade Abram itomolu Melkisedek tunanare bonyo nam inety desikre mumu neke yal sasam toha heanke ma yal ti Melkisedek.
Lemade raja Sodomke byu ti Abram de byohe, “Abram o, lemamo mal a molik wasikw irire ma yaw, klala ara wasimy lan ribun desikre mal ma oa mosy.”
Keskyede Abram hyalas raja Sodom desy de byohe, “Kuhwab ti YANWE Hulasow Lan Lahuk maala lait o lasmyerke khaha ne,
ma kbwohe ana lema kal namit-namit toha o elik, ma olaske klaike ta sososa lwakwe ktasike dakun o ana lema kal, ma kyait o kete mbwohe khyali o mane kuka wasikw maloly ne.

Lemade yaw neke kor wasikw irire lema aramy myal namit-namit de kotw aramy mina dai desy bo. Keskyede liakw manor yaw nekre, neke Aner, ode Eskol, ode Mamre, sir ne musti mo rosy wat toha nam kunal kolik desikre.”
Lemadendye YANWE
mya ma syusu I ti Abram ode tyanuk ma byohe, “Abram o, kete mumtaut kali ana kbwa eta o ti atyatke ode kal watamkwe ti o dakun o lan a ksyalik.”

Keskyede Abram hyalas YANWE de byohe, “Ebukw YANWE O, nam sai ne ana munal ma yaw ne de? Ana kmwaty bonyo Eliezer iry Damsyik neke iry makarya ma yakwe, ana idurak seikkwe ma syaa i ti malolikw ribun lan munal ma yaw ne, kali lema mal naman ma yaw.”

Keskyede Abram hyalas YANWE de byohe, “Ebukw YANWE O, nam sai ne ana munal ma yaw ne de? Ana kmwaty bonyo Eliezer iry Damsyik neke iry makarya ma yakwe, ana idurak seikkwe ma syaa i ti malolikw ribun lan munal ma yaw ne, kali lema mal naman ma yaw.”
Keskyede YANWE tyanuk huruk ti Abram de byohe, “Iry makarya ti o desike ana lema syaa i ti malolimw desikre, de ana anamw elik-elik ne i ne isaa i ti malolimw desikre ne.”

Maktei bonyo YANWE yor Abram ma rbetik toha lasyerkye ei mloskye, ode tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Abram o, matos ei laitke, ode maki a thun nekre. Ana lema maki mal sir. Kola dene ana lema raki ral tesnwo natumw aryaritke dakun.”
Lemade Abram tyohak YANWE tun itanukare, dendye YANWE byohe “Abram neke iry a mlakye.”
Maktei bonyo YANWE byu ti Abram huruk de byohe, “YANWE a Yaw, ma kola kulaka o ma mbyetik toha hnu Ur-Kasdimke, ma ana kal lasmyer Kanaan neke ti mosy mumu.”
Desikeo Abram yena Hulasokwe de byohe, “Ebukw YANWE O, kyosy kabei mane kuhe o lasmyer neke ana kunosy ne de?”

Lemade YANWE hyalas i de byohe, “Desikemo mal heal a wait ainare nenmo kinait enatelw desikre, neke saby wamfwetke sasam, biby wamfwetke sasam, ode domba wamwankye sasam, ktyabal manu lakterkwe ode manu hahkye ratsam-ratsam ma Yaw.”

Dendye Abram yal heal desikre ti YANWE, neke saby o biby o domba desikre ratsam-ratsam ode syin sir ti kbya raru. Maktei bonyo tyenuk heal a kseri desikre ma it de kisara it ti desy, keskyede manu deru desike lema syin a sir.
Ode manu alal kyalamo mana heal a mamaty nekre rma ma rtuny a heal dai Abram isin ti kiba raru desikre bonyo, Abram yesak sir.
Lemade kyala ma sekwe idi bonyo, Abram yenah ma tyebti desy. Ode klatsam mait bonyo, kelerakok lanke kmya ma kyety matautke ma kdyan i ti desy.

Lemade YANWE byu ti Abram de byohe, “Klwosu ti o ma mhwe elik ohe tesnwo natumw nekre ana mwakun sir ti irire nusat, ode ana raka at ti iry desikre dakun, ode iry desikre ana rala atyat sir ainke atkwe enaat.
Keskyede nus ana raka at ti desike, ana kukun sir, ode kyoat tesnwo natumw a rbetik toha nus desy, desikeo ana rba o rety maloly ribun lan ne.
Keskyede oi ne ana wasimw ainke lan ma kryesik iry ribun lan ne, desikeo nenmo mmwaty. Ma ti ramlin a o mosy eraske.

Keskyede ana taras enaatke bonyo nenmo tesnwo natumw rulak sir mai ne, neke lasmyer Amorike, kali senwe iry Amori-nare wait lim o sal lenla kyoat. Keskyede taras enaat desike ana kdi ti ode iry Amori-nare wait lim o sal ne kyoat mumu, desikeo nenmo tesnwo natumw resak a iry Amori desikre.”
Ode sekwe idi ma kelerkok bonyo, kelersoru akye kwenake it ma kdyuhan ktyabal hadukke it ma kdyelaf ma kmya ma kyosy heal rasin ti kiba raru desikre klelanke.
Kyoat sew desike dakun o YANWE ihatetak ti Abram ma tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Kuhatetak ti o ohe kal lasmyer ne mumu kyala kyosy sah Mesirke ma ti kyait sah Efratke ti tesnwo natumw.
Lasmyer neke iry Keni-nare, iry Kenas-are, iry Kadmon-are,
iry a Het-are, iry Feris-are, iry Refa-nare,
iry Amori-nare, iry Kanaan-are, iry a Girgasi-nare ode iry Yebus-are raktemtem ne mumu wait lasmyerare kal ti tesnwo natumw ma rosy.”
Sarai neke Abram sawa i, ma lema ika anan, ode wasi atke it ma wamfwet a i neke yosy Mesir, ma ani Hagar,

ode sekwe it bonyo Sarai byu ti lai Abram de byohe, “Awa, mhwe ohe YANWE lema byu ma kuka anakw, lemamo ti menah mor wasikw at desy. Anakyai kyosy a i, desyo idur hahak namanke it ma yaw.” Lemade Abram tyoha tun sawa-na itanuk desy.
Lemadendye Sarai yal Hagar iry Mesir desy ti lai Abram ma ramruan a i. Ode kyoat desikeo Abram imin ti Kanaan ainke hean de.
Lemade Abram yenah yor Hagar. Desike bonyo Hagar yor tenanke, ode Hagar ihe ma inor tenanke bonyo, yaran wasi lalan Sarai ode ihmwai i.
Dendye Sarai tyanuk ti Abram de byohe, “Awa, salamkwe ne. Kali kal wasikw atke ti o ma menah mor i, ma inor tenanke bonyo, yaran yaw ode ihmwai yaw. Lemamo YANWE yukun tun ne ti oa mor a yaw.”

Desike bonyo Abram hyalas sawa Sarai ma byu de byohe, “He. Kolnye, at desike iry muharetake, de kyosy a o ma mala i kolkyabei ta kabei bo.” Dendye Sarai yala atyat ma ksunw lanidik ti Hagar, lemadendye Hagar ila toha sir.
Ode Hagar lyakut ma bya nini inait werke kmatake it ti wen malosy-loskye bonyo, YANWE wasi Nyasoke
mya ma inal a yor i. Werke kmata neke knyey a sal mabakola nus a Syurke kserike.
Lemade YANWE wasi Nyasoke tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Hagar o. Oi ne mkwarya ti Sarai. Mala kolkyabei mane mumai ne de, ode mala ma mbwai kabei ne de?”
Desikeo Hagar hyalas I ma byu de byohe, “Kula toha Sarai enakw kukarya tike.”
Lemade YANWE wasi Nyasoke tyanuk huruk de byohe, “Molik o ma mbwa ti mait enamw Sarai mukarya ti desy, ode mala tenamkwe ma ne hah ne bo. Ode kyosy a i ma yala o kolkyabei ta kabei o, mtwoha bo.
Kali ana kala o ma tesnwo natumw ribun sir a ksyalik, ma lema kika iry maaki kyal sir,
ode ana lema soso bonyo mudur hahak naman wamwankye it, desikeo maki anike ti Ismael
kali YANWE tyomolu o ma mswer ti muhar ktela atyat ribun ne.

Ode anamw desike ana mormyorhyanke kola keledai mata mnaske, ma ihatw, ode syorw kabei ta kabei bo. Ode iry kabei ta kabei dakun o ana isorw a ike dakun bo. Ode ti wen a imin tike, ana lema tyomolu waike it elik.”
Lemade Hagar byu ti YANWE matanuk tun ti i ne de byohe, “Desikemo kaki animkwe ti El-Roi.”
Maktei bonyo Hagar ryekan ti ralake de byohe, “Mlay bain, ti wen neke katos a Hulasow maseak yaw ne.”
Mane irire raki werke kmata desy ti “Wer Lahai-Roike.”
Wer desike kimin ti hnu Kadeshke ode hnu Beredke klelanke.
Lemadendye Hagar idur hahak naman wamwankye it ti Abram, ma Abram yaki naman desy anike ti Ismael.
Ode kyoat naman wamwany desy radur ti i bonyo, Abram wasi ainke hean-walw kresi nem (86).

Kyoat Abram wasi ainke hean-siw kresi siw (99) bonyo, YANWE mya ma syusu I ti i ma byohe, “Abram o, Yaw neke Hulasow Malkyakaw Lahuk Yaw. Mtwomolu Yaw, ode mtwoha tun kutanukare ode mmworif mo nelnyely a o.
Dendye ana kuhatetak kor a o, ode kala o ma mmwel ma ribun o ratut e.”
Lemade Abram syakitil ti I, ode Hulasokwe tyanuk huruk de byohe,
“Tnyetak kunor a oke ne: Yaw ne kala o ma tesnwo natumw ribun sir ma rala nus ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode iry mamin ti nus desikre mumu ne amat a o,
dendye ana lema animw a ‘Abram’ de, de animw a ‘Abraham’,
kali ktwetak de, ma ana tesnwo natumw ribun sir ma rala nus ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode iry mamin ti nus desikre mumu ne amat a o.
Yaw ne ana kala o ma tesnwo natumw ribun ratut sir ma rala nusare ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode kyosy sir dakun o ana dum a raka raja.
Ode ana wasikw hatetak neke lema kimres, de kuhatetak ti ituru ma ti kyal tesnwo natumw ma ti ktyutw teike, ma wasimw Hulasow a Yaw, ti kyal tesnwo natumw nekre mumu.
Ode lasmyer Kanaan mumwakun ti ne ana kal mumu ti o a mor a tesnwo natumw ma midurak ode mmyon ti, ti kiba knaru ne. Ode ana tesnwo natumw wait Hulasow a Yaw.”

Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe tyanuk ti Abraham huruk de byohe, “Oi neke mor ebnwo anamw ma ti kyal tesnwo natumw musti mo mtyoha haret a kutunik ti e ne ti kiba knaru ne: Ma oi neke ana mor tesnwo natumw wamwanire mumu neke musti mo ratosa tenamire.

Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe tyanuk ti Abraham huruk de byohe, “Oi neke mor ebnwo anamw ma ti kyal tesnwo natumw musti mo mtyoha haret a kutunik ti e ne ti kiba knaru ne: Ma oi neke ana mor tesnwo natumw wamwanire mumu neke musti mo ratosa tenamire.

Lemade kyala kyosy ne, naman wamwany a radur ti sir ma kolnye wait sekwe walw (8), desikeo ratosa tenatare, ma ktyoha haret a kutunik ti o ne. Ode o dakun o mor wamwany mamin wasimw sekye krala desy, rtabal wamwany makarya ti seimw desike, ror atamw wamwany muselw desikre mumu, neke musti mo ratosa tenamire dakun. Ode myatosa tenamire koldyesy ma mnyenas myal tnyetak a kuhatetak kor oke.

Lemade kyala kyosy ne, naman wamwany a radur ti sir ma kolnye wait sekwe walw (8), desikeo ratosa tenatare, ma ktyoha haret a kutunik ti o ne. Ode o dakun o mor wamwany mamin wasimw sekye krala desy, rtabal wamwany makarya ti seimw desike, ror atamw wamwany muselw desikre mumu, neke musti mo ratosa tenamire dakun. Ode myatosa tenamire koldyesy ma mnyenas myal tnyetak a kuhatetak kor oke.
Lemadendye wamwany desikre mumu musti mo ratosa tenatare ma ktyoha haret a kutunik ti o ne. Rala koldyesy ma ranenenas tnyetak a kuhatetak ti oke ti kiba knaru ne.
Ode kolnye wamwany kabei lema ratosa tenanke, desikemo wamwany desike resak i toha wasi irire, kali lema tyoha haret a kutunik ti o ne.”
Maktei bonyo Hulasokwe byu ti Abraham de byohe, “Kete mabuk sawamw ti Sarai de, de kyala kyosy neke mabuk i ti Sara.

Ode kal eraske ti i, ma ana idur hahak naman wamwankye it ti o. Ode kal eraske ti i huruk ma ana tesnwo natu ribun ratut sir ma rala nusare ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode iry mamin nus desikre mumu enat a i, ode ana tesnwo natu nekre dum a raka Raja ti nusare.”

Lemade Abraham syakitil ti Hulasokwe, keskye imahis ode ryekan ti ralake ma byohe, “Neke mlay e? Mane wasikw ainke atw de (100). Ode amosw a yaw de. Ode ana kuka anakw huruk e? Ode ana Sara ika anan kolkya, mane wasi ainke hean-siw (90) deny ode?”
Dendye byu ti Hulasokwe de byohe, “Ebukw Hulasow O, lemamo Ismael ana yosy eras munal ma yaw nekre bo.”
Keskye Hulasokwe tyanuk ti i de byohe, “Abraham o, lema koldyesy! Sawamw Sara desike ana idur hahak naman wamwankye it ti o, desikeo maki anike ti Ishak.
Ode tnyetak kuhatetak kunor o desy ana kal ti Ishak dakun, ma ti kyal tesnwo natu nekre ti kiba knaru ne.

Keskyede ktwoha nam mutenke. Lemade ana kal eraske ti Ismael dakun, ode tesnwo natu ana rmel ma ribun ratut sir. Ode Ismael neke ana rajake hean a kresi enaru (12) amat a i, ode tesnwo natu ana khwamela sir ma nusatke lan.
Keskyede tnyetak kuhatetak neke ana kkwau kor Ishak. Ode lenla ainke sasam huruk, desikeo Sara idur hahak Ishak ti o.”
Kyoat Hulasokwe itanuk maktei bonyo bya toha Abraham.
Ode ti sew desike dakun o Abraham yabuk anan Ismael yor wamwany mamin ti wasi lasyery krala desikre, ror wamwany iselw desikre mumu ma yatosa tenatare ma ktyoha haret a Hulasokwe itunik ti i desy.
Ode kyoat Abraham ratosa tenanke, desikeo wasi ainke kyait hean-siw kresi siw (99),
klala kyoat a ratosa Ismael tenanke desike bonyo wasi ainke hean a kresi enatelw (13).
Lemadendye, ti sew desy dakun o, Abraham yor anan Ismael, rtabal a wamwany mamin ti Abraham wasi lasyery krala desikre raktemtem mumu ne ratosa tenatare.
Lemadendye, ti sew desy dakun o, Abraham yor anan Ismael, rtabal a wamwany mamin ti Abraham wasi lasyery krala desikre raktemtem mumu ne ratosa tenatare.

Kyoat a Abraham imin ti wenke it ma knyey Mamre wasi aw lan de lan desikre, ode sekwe it bonyo, YANWE mya ma syusu I ti Abraham. Kyoat desyo Abraham tyaklulw ti wasi salhaha lasyerkye, kali sekwe manas i a ksyalik.
Ode kyoat ibitil matake bonyo, myatakit irkye enatelw ma ramdiry ti lasyerkye lulkwe. Lemade Abraham imdiry ma ila yosy wasi lasyerkye ma ti iney a sir bonyo syakitil ti sir,
ode byu de byohe, “Amakw e, kete mkyeyer a yaw. Kuten ma kete mbya de mmya de mtyaklulw aduk.
Ode mtyaklulw akwe kmauan ne ma mihnaw e aduk, ma lemamo kbwa ti kal werke tebikan ma myut lwaumire,
ode kbwa ti kal a rotkye it ma mi, ma kyakora e aduk, mamode mbyai kabei ta kabei o kyosy e bo. Kali kolnye amakure mtyaklulw ti wenakw kumin ti ne desikemo ketimdedan.”
Lemade iry desikre rhalas i ma rbohe, “Desikemo mala kola mutanuk desy.”
Lemade Abraham lyahlaha mirin ti syukar wasi lasyery desy ti yait Sara, ma byu ti i de byohe, “Mlwaha mirin ma mal gandumke kminan eras desike kadutke sasam
ma mal ma mala rotire.”
Maktei bonyo Abraham ila byai wasi saby o domba wenat, ma ti yilik saby anan mamsun eras-eras ne it, ma yal ti wasi makaryake it ma kyarya heal desy mirin.
Maktei bonyo Abraham yal bibkye wasi suskwe kwenke ode kejuke ktyabal heal dai ranoha desy ma yal ti iry desikre ra, ode imdiry ti akwe kusuke ma lema soso toha iry desikre wen raknam tike.
Raknam maktei bonyo, rena i de rbohe, “Sawamw Sara ikabei de?”
Desyo Abraham hyalas ma byohe, “I so lasyerkye kralake.”
Dendye iry desikre it a byu ti i de byohe, “Ana ainke sasam huruk, kolik a yaw ma kait a o. Ma lenla kunait a o bonyo, mlay bain o sawamw Sara idur hah de, ma ananke wamwany a i.”
Kyoat desikeo Sara imin ti salhaha lasyery desike, ma iry desikre rsanyetat a i, ode Sara tyomolu iry desike tun itanukare.
Keskyede Abraham yor sawa Sara neke enmosw o amosw sir de, ma lema raka anat de.
Dendye Sara imahis ti ralake ma byohe, “Yaw neke enmosw a yaw de, ode laikw dakun o amosw i de, ode ana aramy myala kolkyabei ma aramy mitot naman ma aramy mimukmuka aramy de?”
Lemade YANWE tyanuk huruk ti Abraham de byohe, “Kyanmwane Sara imahis ma byu de byohe, ‘Ana mlay bain o kudur hahak namanke it e? Mane enmosw a yaw deny ode?’
Keskyede nam sai YANWE lema yala hye de? Kola nenmo kutanuk ti o ne: ainke sasam desikeo kulak Yaw ma kait a o, kyoat desy dakun o Sara idur hah de ma ananke wamwany a i.”
Dendye Sara imtaut, mane tyuly ma byohe, “Yaw ne lema kumahis.” Keskyede YANWE hyalas i ma byohe, “Ah, mlay bain o dai mumahis de.”
Ode kyoat iry desikre raknam maktei bonyo, ramdiry ma rba. Desikeo Abraham lyakut yor sir ma kele syeak ti sir ode rlakut ba nini ranait kususwanke bonyo ranunu ei hnu Sodomke ti ktebteban Yordanke.
Desike bonyo YANWE ryekan ti ralake kralake ma byohe, “Nam kala ma kuala nekre kubrai kuhunik ti Abraham,
kali ana Abraham tesnwo natu ribun sir ma nusatke lan a ksyalik ode rhareta. Ode kyosy a i, ana kal eraske ti nus mamin ti lasmyerke khaha neke mumu.
Abraham kilik i ma ana yal haretke ti anan o tesnwo natu ma rtomolu Yaw ma rmorif eras ode ramdiry ti nam a mlaire, desikemo ana ktwoha tnyetak kuhatetak ti Abrahamke.”
Maktei bonyo YANWE tyanuk ti Abraham ma byohe, “Ktwomolu o irire rarwen kali iry a mamin ti Sodom ode Gomora nekre rahatw ode totatare atyat a ksyalik.
Lemamo korw ma ti katos, neke mlay bain o iry nekre totnyo yabit kola dene irire ratanuk ma Yaw ne ta lema de. Ma kolnye nam ratanuk ma Yaw nekre mlay mo khwe ode sal mo khwe dakun.”
Dendye irkye enaru rorw ma rbai a Sodom, keskyede YANWE yor Abraham ramdiry ti desy bo.
Lemadendye Abraham ti nyey a YANWE ode tyanuk de byohe, “Kolkyabei mane ana mutabahunw iry a mlay o iry maka salatare raktemtem ne de?
Kolnye iry a mlaire hean-sim (50) ramin a hnu desy, desikemo ana mtwuhar a hnu desike dakun e, de lema maorif a hnu desike khyali iry a dehean-sim a mlay desy e?

Kete mala koldyesy ode kete mala namit-namit ma ktyabahunw iry a mlaire kola iry maka salatare. Lemamo maditi nam maoly desikre toha O. Kali Oi ne mtwetak tunke ti iry a mamin ti lasmyerke khaha ne, ode khwe ohe ana mohut a mlakye bo.”
Lemade YANWE tyanuk de byohe, “Kolnye kait irkye hean-sim (50) ma ramorif neke rala nam a mlaire bo ti hnu Sodomke, desike bonyo lema ktwuhar hnuke ktem desy mumu khyali iry desikre.”
Keskyede Abraham hyalas huruk ma byohe, “Ebukw O, kuten ma kete mkweyer a yaw ti kures a O ma ktwanuk a kswaur tunakure ei lulkwe huruk ne, kali yaw neke iry a yaw bo.

Keskyede kolnye iry a ramorif ma rala nam a mlaire ne lema rait hean-sim, de irkye hean-at a kresi enasim sir (45) bo. Ode khyali ktera desim desy bonyo ana mtwuhar hnu desy ba mumu khyali iry a desim desy e?”
Desike bonyo Hulasokwe byohe, “Kolnye kutot iry a mlakye hean-at a kresi enasim sir, desikemo hnu desike ana lema ktwuhar ba.”
Lemade Abraham tyanuk huruk de byohe, “Ebukw O, ode kolnye irkye hean-at sir (40) bonyo kolkya?”
Desyo Hulasokwe hyalas i de byohe, “Ana lema kala koldyesy, khyali iry dehean-at desike.”
Desikeo Abraham ikita ma tyanuk huruk ma byohe, “Ebukw O, kolnye kutun huruk mo kete mkweyer a yaw, kolnye mutot iry a mlakye hean-telw (30) sir o so bonyo kolkya?”
Desyo Hulasokwe byohe, “Kolnye kutot iry a mlakye hean-telw sir o so bo, desikeo ana lema kala namit-namit.”
Keskye Abraham byu huruk de byohe, “Ebukw O, kuten ma kete muka keyer a yaw, kolnye kswaur tunakure ei lulkwe huruk. Ebukw Hulasow O, kolnye irkye hean-ru sir (20) mo, kolkya?”
Desyo Hulasokwe hyalas ma byohe, “Kolnye kutot irkye hean-ru sir, desike bonyo hnu desike ana lema ktwuhar ba.”
Lemadendye Abraham tyanuk huruk de byohe, “Ebukw Hulasow O, kete muka keyer a yaw kolnye ktwanuk it huruk. Kolnye mutot irkye hean (10) sir mo kolkya?”
Desyo Hulasokwe hyalas i de byohe, “Kolnye irkye hean sir, desyo hnu desike ana lema ktwuhar ba.”
Ode YANWE itanuk ti Abraham maktei bonyo bya, ode Abraham yulak i ma myai wasi lasyerkye.
Hulasokwe wasi nyaso deru manosy lait desy rait Sodom o sekwe bya.
Sew desy dakun o Lot tyaklulw ti salhaha lorkye kmatake ode iatos iry desikre bonyo, imdiry ma ti byalan sir, lemade syakitil ti sir,
ode tyanuk ti sir de byohe, “Amam lan e, kuten toha e ma tbai wasikw sekye ti myut lwaumire ode myenah ti seikkwe metdyet ne. Ma msarin ode nenmo mlyakut bai lulkwe.”
Keskyede iry desikre rhalas i ma rbohe, “Lema nam, de ana aramy myenah ti mleran ne bo.”
Keskyede Lot tyanuk lanidik, lemade iry desikre rtoha ma rbai Lot wasi sekye. Ti ranait sekye bonyo Lot nyoha kotw o abw mtelas nekre ktyabal rotkye
ma yal ti iry desikre ma ra.
Keskyede iry desikre lenla renaf bonyo, wamwanire mumu ti hnu Sodom desike, kyala kyosy lyalaure ma ti kyait amosure, neke lema sasam yei etke dakun, de rma mumu ma rkoal eta Lot wasi sekye.
Ode reik ma rtanuk ti Lot de rbohe, “Iry dai mamai seimw neke sir ka? Mal sir ei mloskye ma aramy myala atyat ti sir.”
Lemadendye Lot byetik ode hyolat eta holholatke ode tyanuk de byohe, “Hatnimakkwe kete myala ktela atyatke.
Lemadendye Lot byetik ode hyolat eta holholatke ode tyanuk de byohe, “Hatnimakkwe kete myala ktela atyatke.

Ei ne mhye o anakw wamfwetke enaru, ma wamwanire lenla rakari sir elik, lemamo ana kal sir ei mloskye ti e, ode myala sir kola dene ktela mibohe eraske ne, klala mwakun mamin seikkwe krala neke kete myala atyatke myor sir, kali ramin seikkwe kralake de.”

Keskyede iry Sodom desikre rbu ti Lot de rbohe, “Maditi lakhidik o! Oi neke nenmo mmwai ne, ma mola mwakun, ode mobak ma mhwareta aramy dakun e! Ana mhwury de aramy myala atyat ti o ma kbyilak iry deru desy!” Lemade iry desikre ralkyaw sir ti Lot ode rlubur ba ti robak ma rtual holholatke.
Keskyede Hulasokwe wasi nyaso deru desy rlol simatare ti rbity Lot ei sekye kralake, ode rholat eta holholatke.
Maktei bonyo rala iry ribun mamin holholatke kmata desy, neke kakan o lan ma matatare kbyol ma ramas ti de ramas ma keskyede lema rhe toha holholat desy.
Maktei bonyo iry deru desike rtanuk ti Lot de rbohe, “Muka hatnimamw ti ne e? Mbwu ti anamw wamfwet wamwany rtabal msalenamw o sobaimw o hatnimamure mumu, ma mor sir de mbyetik toha hnu ne,
kali ana aramy msyolyo msyarah hnu ne ba. Kali ribun a rarwen ti YANWE ti ktela atyat mamin nus ne, lemadendye YANWE yaso aramy ma mmya ma msyolyo msyarah hnu ne.”

Dendye Lot a bya ti tyanuk ti ananare lyalautare de byohe, “Mbyitil e ma adoko mbyetik toha hnu ne, kali YANWE ana syolyo syarah hnu ne ba.” Keskye ananare lyalaut desikre lema rtohak Lot nam itanuk desikre, kali rbohe syalik a sir bo.

Lemade kiarasik a msarinke bonyo, Hulasokwe wasi nyaso deru desike rbu ti Lot de rbohe, “Mlwaha mirin, mbwitil o ma mor sawamw ode anamw deru ne, ma adoko mbyetik toha hnu ne ma kete mmyaty, kali Hulasokwe yala ma syoly o syarah hnu ne ba mumu.”

Keskye Lot neke ralake mdedan ma byetik, lemade Hulasokwe wasi nyaso deru desike rkumak a Lot yor sawa o anan deru desy simatare ode reuk sir ma rbetik toha hnu desy, ode rtunik sir ma rba, kali YANWE lyobak a sir.

Maktei bonyo nyaso desy it a byu ti sir de byohe, “Adoko mila ma ti myaorif tenamire, kete myulak matamire ma myatos ei lyakwe, ode kete mimres dakun ti ktebteban Yordanke, de mila a myobak huarare ma kete mmyaty liklikan.”
Keskye Lot a hyalas iry deru desy ma byohe, “Amakkwe, kuten ma kete koldyesy.

Yaw neke wasimy iry a yaw, ode khwe ohe ralamy kralanare kdyakin a yaw ma myaorif yaw, ode wasimy eraske lan ma yaw de. Keskyede lema kula a kal bai huar so kali soso, kali kumtaut o kolnye lenla kait so, desikeo reba munal ti nus ne ana ktyoha yaw ti ktyabahunw a yaw.
De matos a hnu so. Hnu soke kakan bo, ode lema soso, de lemamo mou ma kula kbwai hnu kakan so. Hnu soke kakan bo, ma lemamo myaorif yaw o so.”
Lemade nyaso manosy lait desike hyalas i ma byohe, “Kou, ode ktwoha nam mutanuk desikre mumu de, neke hnu ana muba ti desike lema kswoly o kswarah ba.
De mlwaha mirin ma adoko mula mbwai so, kali ana lenla kala namit-namit, kolnye lenla mait o so.” Lemadendye raki hnu desy ti Zoar,
kali byu ohe hnu desike kakan.
Lemade Lot rala rbai Zoar. Ode kyoat ranait bonyo sekwe byetik ma ryan nuske.
Lemadendye YANWE nyauk us akye ode us hatw maharharke kyosy a laitke ma ksyolyo ksyarah hnu Sodom o, Gomora o,
hnu mamin ti ktebteban Yordan desy mumu, ktyabal wer o aw matuhw ti lasmyer desy mumu ma ktei.
Kyoat desike bonyo sawa-na yulak matake ei lyakwe, lemadendye tyoy a tul taisiskye.
Ode bolbolbol ne bonyo Abraham byatar a kmuna ma lyakut bai wen a liahke imdiri yor a YANWE tike,
ode inunu ei Sodom ode Gomora ktyabal a ktebteban Yordanke mumu, neke yatos o akye kduduhanke kdyuhan kyosy lasmyerke ma kele roan ei srake.
Lemadendye kyoat Hulasokwe syoly o syarah hnu ribun mamin ti ktebteban Yordanke ktyabal wen Lot imin tike bonyo, Hulasokwe nyenas yal a Abraham, lemadendye Hulasokwe yaditi Lot toha wen desy.
Maktei bonyo Lot yor anan wamfwet deru desy rbetik toha Zoar ma ti ramin ti huarare, kali Lot imtaut ma imin ti Zoar. Lemade Lot yor anan wamfwet deru desy ramin ti oaske kralake ma rmon ti desy bo.
Lemade anan wamfwet auskwe byu ti wai amurkye de byohe, “Ity amatke amosw i de, ode lema kika wamwany ti ne ma rasaa ror ity ma taka ity anat.
Lemamo tal tasy maiskye kwen makitkye ti ity amatke yenw ma lema hye toha lbweta, ode tenah tor i ma taka ity tesnwo natut kyosy ity amatke.”
Lemadendye sewahke bonyo, deruke rlik tasy maiskye kwen makitkye ma ral ti amatke yenw, ode wamfwet auskwe syukar ti yenah yor amatke, keskyede amatke lema hye ktela iala ti ananke ti yenah yor i ne.

Msarinke bonyo, wamfwet auskwe byu ti amurkye de byohe, “Detke kenah kor ity amatke de, lemade sewah neke tlik tasy maiskye kwen makitkye ti ity amatke yenw huruk ma kyala i, mamode oa mswukar ti menah mor i, ma taka ity tesnwo natut toha ity amatke.”
Lemade sewahke bonyo, rlik tasy maiskye kwen makitkye ma ral ti amatke yenw, ode wamfwet amurkye syukar ti yenah yor amatke, keskyede amatke lema hye ktela iala ti ananke ti yenah yor i ne.
Dendye Lot anan wamfwet deru desy ror tenatare kali kyosy amatke.
Ma auskwe idur hahak naman wamwankye, ma raki anike ti Moab, i neke iry Moab-are amat a i.
Ode wamfwet amurkye idur hahak naman wamwankye dakun, ma raki anike ti Ben-Ami,
i neke iry Amon-are amat a i.
Sekwe it bonyo Abraham yosy Mamre wasi lasmyerke ma byai lasmyer Negebke ma imin ti hnu Kadeshke ode hnu Syurke klelanke. Ode yosy desy ma byai hnu Gerarke ma imwakun ti.
Ode Abraham neke tyanuk ti iry Gerar-are de byohe Sara neke rahyeta i. Lemade Abimelekh raja Gerar desike itomolu bonyo, yaso ma ti ral Sara ma ror i ba ti i.
Lemade metdyetke it bonyo, Abimelekh yenaf, ode myey o Hulasokwe mya ma syusu tenanke ti i ma byu de byohe, “Abimelekh, ana mmwaty mane! Kali wamfwet munal desike ika lai de.”
Keskyede Abimelekh hyalas ma byohe, “Ebo, wamfwet neke lenla kenaf kor a i elik, ode kolkyabei ne mala ma mtwabahunw yaw kor nusakw a lema maka salat nekre de?
De lema iry desike byohe, ‘Wamfwet neke rahyetakw a i’ e? Ode wamfwet ne byu dakun ma byohe, ‘Naraku i ne.’ Dendye ktela kuala ne dakun o kala kor ralakw nelnyelkye, ode simakw a krala nelnyelkye.”

Lemade Hulasokwe hyalas a i ti meike kralake ma byu de byohe, “Khwe dakun o ktela muala neke mala mor ralamw nelnyelkye, lemade kyala kyosy wamfwet desike ti isukar seimkwe ma ti kyait senwe, kala o ma kete menah mor i ma kete musal ma Yaw.
